sources.title: Dracula 1931 colorized (Bela Lugosi)
sources.description: Transylvanian vampire Count Dracula bends naive real estate agent Renfield to his will so that he can move to London. He takes up residence at an estate where he sleeps in his coffin by day and searches for potential victims by night. After turning the young Lucy Weston into a vampire, Dracula turns his attention to her friend Mina. But Mina's father calls in a specialist, Dr. Van Helsing, to diagnose the sudden deterioration in Mina's health. Bela Lugosi as Count Dracula Helen Chandler as Mina Seward David Manners as John Harker Dwight Frye as Renfield Edward Van Sloan as Van Helsing Herbert Bunston as Doctor Seward Frances Dade as Lucy Weston I colorized this using AI software that doesn't always get the colors right, but I think it looks fairly natural.

sources.title: White Zombie 1932 colorized (Bela Lugosi)
sources.description: A man invites a woman to have her wedding at his Haitian plantation in order to lure her away from her fianc√©, but things go wrong when he attempts to fake her death and bring her under his control by means of a zombie potion. Bela Lugosi as 'Murder' Legendre Madge Bellamy as Madeline Short Parker Joseph Cawthorn as Dr. Bruner Robert Frazer as Charles Beaumont John Harron as Neil Parker Brandon Hurst as Silver I colorized this using AI software that doesn't always get the colors right, but I think it looks fairly natural. Hopefully a more professional job will be done someday.

metadata.Plot: Actor Bela Lugosi discusses his career, his social life, and his feelings about his most famous role, Count Dracula.
